requirements.summary: Restore the complete project state from Version 67, including all frontend files and configuration
acceptanceCriteria: All files match the exact state they were in at Version 67
Frontend components are restored to Version 67 implementation
AuthProvider-related changes from Versions 68-71 are removed
Application builds and deploys successfully with Version 67 code

file_operations.description: Restore the main.tsx entry point to its Version 67 state, ensuring the provider hierarchy and component structure match Version 67 exactly
Restore App.tsx to Version 67 implementation, reverting any routing, state management, or component structure changes made after Version 67
Restore AuthContext.tsx to Version 67 implementation, removing any AuthProvider wrapper changes or authentication context modifications introduced in Versions 68-71
Restore useInternetIdentity hook to Version 67 state, reverting any authentication flow changes made after Version 67
Restore useActor hook to Version 67 implementation, ensuring actor initialization and authentication integration match Version 67
Restore AuthView component to Version 67 state, reverting any layout or authentication flow changes
Restore LoginForm to Version 67 implementation, ensuring form handling and validation match Version 67
Restore RegistrationForm to Version 67 implementation, reverting any form changes made after Version 67
Restore LogoutButton to Version 67 state, ensuring logout flow matches Version 67
Restore ProfileSetupModal to Version 67 implementation, reverting any modal behavior or styling changes
Restore CaseFormDialog to Version 67 state, ensuring form dialog implementation matches Version 67
Restore CasesListView to Version 67 implementation, reverting any list rendering or interaction changes
Restore DashboardView to Version 67 state, ensuring dashboard layout and functionality match Version 67
Restore SettingsView to Version 67 implementation, reverting any settings UI or functionality changes
Restore useQueries hook to Version 67 state, ensuring query definitions and data fetching logic match Version 67
Restore global CSS to Version 67 state, ensuring theme variables and styling match Version 67
Restore application CSS to Version 67 state, reverting any color scheme or styling changes made after Version 67
Restore Tailwind configuration to Version 67 state, ensuring theme customization matches Version 67

requirements.summary: Remove any AuthProvider context wrapper or authentication context changes that were introduced after Version 67
acceptanceCriteria: No AuthProvider wrapping errors occur in production build
Authentication flow works as it did in Version 67

file_operations.description: Verify and restore AuthContext provider structure to Version 67, removing any nested provider wrapping or context changes that cause build errors
Verify provider hierarchy in main.tsx matches Version 67, ensuring no duplicate or incorrectly nested AuthProvider wrappers exist
Verify Internet Identity hook matches Version 67 implementation, ensuring no authentication wrapper changes interfere with the login flow
